text: The Lithuanian Wikipedia is the Lithuanian language edition of Wikipedia. This edition was started in 2003. As of January, 2024, it is the 52nd largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved January 2, 2024. It currently has over 214,850 articles.Statistics at Lithuanian Wikipedia == References == == Other websites == * Lietuvi≈°koji_Vikipedija Category:Wikipedias
title: Lithuanian Wikipedia
